text: læa phwk khea klaw kæ phiwhnang khxng phwk khea wa thami phwk cea cung pen phyan khadkhan kæ rea la? Phwk man klaw wa xallxhˌ thrng hı rea phud sung phraxngkh thrng hı ru thuk sing thi phud læa phraxngkh thrng srang phwk cea pen khrang ræk læa yang phraxngkh theanan thi phwk cea ca thuk na klab pi
